title: Creating Images for the Archives of History with Bethany Mollenkof
description: Driven by curiosity, Bethany Mollenkof stumbled into a career of photojournalism, ultimately fulfilling a desire to tell stores that are both personal and honest. Bethany joins us to discuss breaking the rules of photojournalism, what it was like to document her own birth experience during the COVID pandemic, and some of her upcoming photography projects.
dc:creator: How You Create
